title.value: Математические модели движения семенного материала по лопастному отражателю рабочей камеры дражиратора
Mathematical models of movement of seed material along the blade reflector of granulator working chamber

journal.title: Bulletin of the Belarussian State Agricultural Academy : the guidance journal

person.name: Chervyakov, A.V., Economy Research Institute of the Ministry of Economy (Belarus)
Mikheev, D.A., Belarus State Academy of Agriculture, Gorki (Belarus)

abstract.value: In the conditions of the Republic of Belarus there was presented an analytical method of research into the dynamics of movement of seeds along the blade reflector and their subsequent movement in the working chamber of granulator. There were obtained dependences, which determine the trajectory of movement of seed along the reflector blade, conditions of its coming off the blade and subsequent movement in the direction of mobile part of granulator chamber. Results of work will be used for the calculation and modeling of different modes of impact on the seed mass and introduced components, with the aim of intensification of the process of their connection and layering in devices of the proposed construction. As a result of the study there was presented the method of research of movement of a seed material in the camera of mixing of a seed pelleting mechanism with use of a blade reflector. As a result of analytical research there were obtained dependences describing a trajectory of movement of a material point along the blade of a reflector of the offered construction, and also a condition of its descent from the blade and the subsequent movement of a point in the direction of mobile part of the working camera. For use of these dependences as mathematical models of movement of seeds in the working camera of a seed pelleting device it is necessary to define experimentally the coefficient considering design features of the working camera of a seed pelleting device, its filling and technological parameters of process of processing.
